None.Name: Infused
None.Description: Confuses all units wthin a 25m radius which will make it impossible for them to distinguish between friend and foe. They will therefore start attacking whatever entity is next to them no matter if it is friendly or hostile. Last for 15 seconds. Reusable every 45 seconds.
